00039 //Construct from string of form "x,y,z" where they are seperated by commas
00040 //or from the form in .obj files, which is "v 2.322 35.6 22.334"
00041 Point3::Point3(std::string pointStr)
00042 {
00043     if (pointStr.find_first_of(',') != std::string::npos) {    //This means that it is a comma delimeted type
00044         //First, remove all spaces
00045         //printf("Point3::Removing all spaces from %s...", pointStr.c_str());
00046         int pos = 0;
00047         loadError = false;
00048         while ((pos = pointStr.find_first_of(' ')) != std::string::npos)
00049         {
00050             pointStr.erase(pos,1);
00051         }
00052         //printf("Done\n");
00053 
00054         //Now get the values
00055         //printf("Point3::Getting values from %s...", pointStr.c_str());
00056         float a,b,c;
00057         if (sscanf(pointStr.c_str(),"%f,%f,%f",&a,&b,&c) == 3)
00058         {
00059             //printf("FoundThem...");
00060             x = a;
00061             y = b;
00062             z = c;
00063         }
00064         else
00065         {
00066             //printf("Didn't Find them, sscanf = %i...", sscanf(pointStr.c_str(),"%d %*c %d %*c %d",&a,&b,&c));
00067             x = y = z = 0;
00068             loadError = true;
00069         }
00070         //printf("Done\n");
00071     } else if (pointStr.size() > 0 && pointStr[0] == 'v') {     //This would indicate a .obj style vertex
00072         //printf("Point3::Getting values from %s...", pointStr.c_str());
00073         float a,b,c;
00074         if (sscanf(pointStr.c_str(), "%*s %f %f %f", &a, &b, &c) == 3) {
00075             //printf("FoundThem...");
00076             x = a;
00077             y = b;
00078             z = c;
00079         } else {
00080             printf("Point3::Error didn't find them, sscanf = %i...", sscanf(pointStr.c_str(), "v %f %f %f", &a, &b, &c));
00081             x = y = z = 0;
00082             loadError = true;
00083         }
00084     } else {    //This would indicate an error in formatting
00085         printf("Point3: Error, string format not recognized\n");
00086         loadError = true;
00087     }
00088 }

00090 //If there was an error in loading the Point (specifically when you load from a string), this will return true. Otherwise false
00091 bool Point3::getLoadError()
00092 {
00093         return loadError;
00094 }

00096 //Add two points/vectors
00097 Point3 Point3::operator +(const Point3& toadd)
00098 {
00099     return Point3(x + toadd.x, y + toadd.y, z + toadd.z);
00100 }

00103 Point3 Point3::operator -(const Point3& tosub)
00104 {
00105     return Point3(x - tosub.x, y - tosub.y, z - tosub.z);
00106 }

00109 Point3 Point3::operator *(const double& tomult)
00110 {
00111     return Point3(x * tomult, y * tomult, z * tomult);

00114 //Dot two vectors
00115 double Point3::operator *(const Point3& todot)
00116 {
00117         return x*todot.x + y*todot.y + z*todot.z;
00118 }
00119 
00120 //Divide by a constant
00121 Point3 Point3::operator /(const double& todiv)
00122 {
00123     if (todiv == 0)
00124     {
00125         return *this;
00126     }
00127     return Point3(x / todiv, y / todiv, z / todiv);
00128 }

00131 Point3 Point3::operator =(Point3 toequal)
00132 {
00133     x = toequal.x;
00134     y = toequal.y;
00135     z = toequal.z;
00136     return toequal;

00139 //Determine if two points are equal
00140 bool Point3::operator ==(Point3 toequal)
00141 {
00142     return (x == toequal.x && y == toequal.y && z == toequal.z);
00143 }

00145 //Dot two vectors and return the dot product
00146 double Point3::dot(const Point3& todot)
00147 {
00148     return x*todot.x + y*todot.y + z*todot.z;
00149 }
00150 
00151 //Return the cross product of two vectors
00152 Point3 Point3::cross(const Point3& tocross)
00153 {
00154     return Point3((y*tocross.z - z*tocross.y), -(x*tocross.z - z*tocross.x), (x*tocross.y - y*tocross.x));
00155 }
00156 
00157 //Dot two vectors
00158 extern double Point3::dot(const Point3& a, const Point3& b)
00159 {
00160         return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z;
00161 }
00162 
00163 //Cross two vectors
00164 extern Point3 Point3::cross(const Point3& a, const Point3& b)
00165 {
00166         return Point3((a.y*b.z - a.z*b.y), -(a.x*b.z - a.z*b.x), (a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x));
00167 }
00168 
00169 //Get the magnitude of a given vector
00170 double Point3::getMag()
00171 {
00172     return sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00173 }
00174 
00175 //Return the unit version of this vector
00176 Point3 Point3::getUnit()
00177 {
00178     return *this/getMag();
00179 }

00181 //Perform a glVertex3d call
00182 void Point3::doVertex()
00183 {
00184     glVertex3d(x,y,z);
00185 }

00187 //Perform a glNormal3d call
00188 void Point3::doNormal() {
00189     glNormal3d(x,y,z);
